ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Useful course to take for a better understanding of various microbiology topics. Interesting discussions of papers presented. Yes I would recommend it.
Yes.You can not only learn the new knowledge about microbial pathogenesis,but also learn the skills for presentation.
Yes, interesting topics, and worthwhile for anyone interested in micro. Would be more likely to recommend if expectations for students were clearer.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Microbiology and Immunology are closely interlinked and this course was thus very helpful to my understanding of various host-pathogen responses since I am in the Immunology track. The chance to practice our presentations was useful as well.
